Class ThumbnailUtil

Untility functions for managing the thumbnail directory.

getNode

public static ConstNode getNode(ConstGameTree tree)
Get a node from the tree to be used for the thumbnail. The position selected is the last position in the main variation or the first position in the main variation that contains both black and white setup stones. The rationale for this is that one usually wants to see the last position of a game, which may contain black handicap setup stones before the moves, but the thumbnail shouldn't show the solution of files containing Go problems.

getPosition

public static ConstBoard getPosition(ConstGameTree tree)
Get a position from the tree to be used for the thumbnail.
